reviewText: I love Ground Force... but I really want to buy the series... This DVD is just a collection of the cast fooling around with bits here and there of them doing several different lawns. It's better than nothing.... but doesn't really give a good overall view of what this show is all about.
Title: The Best of Ground Force - Garden Rescues

reviewText: This is a highlights reel. I would far have preferred some actual episodes of the show, which was EXCELLENT. Someone let me know when they release actual episodes, please!
summary: Love the show... can we please get them?
Title: The Best of Ground Force - Garden Rescues

reviewText: ...a "Best Of" DVD is not enough!!!  The Ground Force team is amazing -- and especially so during the Titchmarsh years.  I would love to sit and watch these episodes over and over again.  Alan, Charlie, and Tommy are not only garden makeover geniuses, but they've winkled their way into the hearts of BBC America fans.  Please, please, please release Ground Force in season by season compilations!
Title: The Best of Ground Force - Garden Rescues

reviewText: The BBC television series Ground Force is a whole lot more than a gardening show. Like Trading Spaces, the team has 48 hours to complete their transformation, usually turning a weedy back garden into a thing of beauty in the space of 48 hours. In between this miraculous accomplishment, there is much banter, the occasional argument, and even a rare, full-blown snit. The team is marvelous, the projects imaginative, and the results always spectacular. It's a wonderful show, much more interesting than the subject implies. Great views of Britain abound as well. However, this DVD just whets the appetite for more. DVD releases by season would be much appreciated!
Title: The Best of Ground Force - Garden Rescues

reviewText: This is the very best series I have ever seen on television before it was put on CD on gardening and landscaping, they make landscaping look so simple and yet they come out with a masterpiece in landscaping.Excellent.
Title: The Best of Ground Force - Garden Rescues

reviewText: My aunt ordered this for a friend of hers because they both love garden stuff.  She was very happy when she got it.
summary: Something for my aunt to give to a friend of hers.
Title: The Best of Ground Force - Garden Rescues
